install.name: ServiceU Event Listings
install.author: Cory Webb Media
install.description: This module shows event listings from the ServiceU API. Can choose the latest events or specific ones to show.

param.name: display_num
param.label: Display #
param.description: The number of events to display

param.name: display_events
param.label: Display Events
param.description: Add the events_id for each event you want to display in a comma-separated list. If ids are entered here, the Display # limit is ignored.
